title: INTERRUPT_CONVERSATION
content:
0xA018A12E5C5C2FA60xF3A67AF3// InterruptConversation
void INTERRUPT_CONVERSATION(Ped interrupterPed, char* context, char* voiceName);Parameters:interrupterPed: the ped speakingcontext: the line to usevoiceName: the voicename for the audio assetHandles conversation interrupts, using the code-side system for improved timing and to minimize unfriendly logic interactions.
codeBlocks:
// InterruptConversation
void INTERRUPT_CONVERSATION(Ped interrupterPed, char* context, char* voiceName);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for INTERRUPT_CONVERSATION
InterruptConversation(ped, '', '')
